data.title: Sri Lanka - life expectancy at birth by gender 2012-2022
data.meta_description: Over the observation period until 2022, the life expectancy exhibits fluctuations among the two gender groups Only for the life expectancy of women at birth, a significant increase can be observed over the observation period.
